1ebdc162-2a21-4606-8bfb-f6e3b1863a35.text:
Gmmco Leadership Team
Chandrashekar V
Managing Director & CEO
A graduate in Mechanical Engineering and a gold medallist from Bangalore University, he has
about 3 decades of experience in the Infrastructure, Mining, Construction & Energy
businesses.As CEO of Gmmco, he strives to build upon a dynamic customer-centric
enterprise.His leadership skills and technology drive contribute immensely to the growth of
Gmmco Ltd.and in providing excellent value to its customers.Image - https://www.gmmco.in/images/chandrashekar-v.jpg
Manikandan Ganesan
Chief Financial Officer &
Company Secretary
A Qualified CMA, CS & Management Graduate with over 25+ years of rich experience in
managing finance, accounts, audit & secretarial functions in various roles across diverse
organizations.He played a pivotal role in enabling business growth in his earlier assignment.He has also been able to transform finance from a mere back end controlling function to a
front end business enabler.Image - https://www.gmmco.in/images/manikandan-g.jpg
Shahid Ashraf
Senior Vice-President
Human Resources & Training
A HR professional with a Post-Graduate Diploma in Personnel Management and experience
of over 25 years.During his career he has handled the entire gamut of HR and IR functions.He likes to work very closely with the business to ensure that the people strategy is tightly
aligned and integrated with the same.Image - https://www.gmmco.in/images/shahid-ashraf.jpg
Rajendra K Parwal
Advisor to MD & CEO
A chartered accountant with more than 35 years of experience in the areas of financial
planning, taxation and accounting, he headed the Finance & Information Technology Group.He is one of the longest serving members of the company and has navigated Gmmco's
finances since 1989.Currently he is the Advisor to MD & CEO
Anuj Keoliya
Senior Vice President
A Mechanical Engineer and a Post Graduate in Marketing from Nagpur University, he has
over 28 years of experience in the Mining Equipment Business.

9f1cae4e-4927-4247-a8f7-db3f18553969.text:
He is proficient in
formulating and driving strategies to grow the Mining Equipment Sales and Service business
in a complex and challenging environment and has a proven track record.His expert skills in
Major Account Management help Gmmco in building long-term sustainable Customer
Relations.

23214c52-2856-4083-bb17-f0195d9555e8.text:
PSH Bisen
Senior Vice President - Strategy
An Automobile Engineer by qualification, he later completed the Leadership Development
Program at IIM(A).He has been with Gmmco for the last 26 years and has progressed from a
frontline PS role to the head of Construction Equipment Business vertical which covered
Product Management, Sales and Product Support.He has deep expertise in Product Support
of Caterpillar Construction & Mining Equipment.Pankaj Kumar Jha
Vice President, Energy and Transportation Business
A mechanical engineering graduate with BE from BIT Mesra and MS from Florida State
University, he also has MBA from Johnson School at Cornell University.He has a rich industry
experience of 26 years.He has worked with companies like GE Power and Water, Cummins
Inc., DRDO, and Hindalco.Throughout his career, Pankaj has worked on product life cycles
through changing emission norms and managing sales in an ever-changing global
competitive environment.He managed sales for the South Asia region for the Perkins brand
of Caterpillar for the last 13 years.Rahul Shorey
Vice President – Construction Equipment Business
Rahul Shorey is an Engineering Graduate from Jadavpur University with more than 30 +
years of rich work experience in Sales & Marketing of Construction equipment.He has
worked with various companies Larsen and Toubro , Tata Hitachi etc. Currently he is the Vice
President – Construction Equipment Business , responsible for the CI prime products sales
and product support.Manikannan V
AVP - Parts Operations & Workshop
An engineer from BITS Pilani with a Master's Degree in Professional Management from Great
Lakes Institute of Management, Chennai, he has over 30 years of rich experience in
Construction & Mining and the Commercial Vehicle Industry.He has contributed immensely
across various functions like product support, product management and business
management.He established and grew the HCV division in Gmmco to a 250 cr business in 6
years.Currently he heads the Parts & Workshop operation of Gmmco and drives Caterpillar
Excellence programs like Service, Parts & Digital for all business verticals.

2f9ae6d9-1564-4a43-8cbf-124a23af1ee8.text:
Rajkumar
COO South
Rajkumar is a MBA graduate with over 20 years of experience in the construction industry.His journey has been deeply rooted in GMMCO for over 17 years handling multiple
portfolios including Rental & Used division, CI Sales and as Regional Business Unit head.

d534c9f9-4c1e-4a48-a2f3-bd7b21ab7f48.text:
Pramod Havinal
COO West
A Mechanical Engineer from National Institute of Engineering , Mysore, Executive MBA from
GLIM Chennai.He has 20 years of experience in the CE industry and worked with various
organizations like SREI group, Kobelco.He has handled multiple roles in Gmmco such as
Rental Division, Product management, RBU Head.Currently he is the COO for West SBU.Durgadutta Ojha
COO North
A Mechanical Engineer with more than 32 years of experience in Engineering Industry,
primarily in Product Support and in areas of Sales, Marketing and Business Development, he
has also completed Executive MBA from Great Lakes Institute of Management in 2012.He
has vast experience in Product Support and Sales of Products like Diesel and Gas Engines on
Industrial, Genset, Marine, Petroleum Applications, Construction and Mining Machines.He
has been with Gmmco since 2004 and has led various Product Support teams across
geographies till 2012.He currently heads the North SBU for GMMCO.Joseph Martin
COO East
A graduate in Mechanical Engineering from B.V.Bhoomaraddi College of Engineering &
Technology, Karnataka and a Master in Business Administration specialised in Marketing &
Advertising from Manipal University, Karnataka, he has over 13 years of experience in the
Mining & Construction Earth Moving Industry and has held various assignments in Sales, Key
accounts Management, Tender Business, Pan India Mining Business, Product Support, New
product Development & Introduction etc. in BEML Limited & Sany Group.He has been with
Gmmco since January 2022.Currently he is designated as Chief Operating Officer for MBG-
SBU East.Pankaj Zade
Head - Rental & Used Equipment
Pankaj Zade is an Engineering Graduate from VNIT, Nagpur and has done General
Management Programme from ISB, Hyderabad.He has more than 28 + years of rich work
experience in Product Support and Techno-Commercial experience in various industry
segments like infrastructure, construction, mining, cement, city gas distribution (CGD) and
compressed biogas.

1fb273fc-f34d-4f09-8aad-33696403b92b.text:
He has worked with Tata Motors, Tata Hitachi, ILFS Engg Co.Ltd, Soma
Enterprise, Adani Group and Ambuja Cement.He Heads the Rental & Used Equipment (RUE)
business.Belur N Bharath
BUSINESS HEAD - GMMCO POWER
A professional with diverse industry experience of 25 Years in sectors of Power and Oil &
Gas.He has contributed immensely across various functions like Sales, Product Support and
Brand building for the Perkins Engines Brand in the industry through Gmmco Power across
sectors of Electric Power Generation and Industrial Engines business.Currently he heads the
Gmmco Power Vertical.He is an engineer from Dr.B R AIT Bengaluru with a Master's Degree
in Professional Management from Great Lakes Institute of Management, Chennai.

937b9026-8e1d-4f8a-a63a-78489f2e7996.text:
What is the CK Birla Group?
The CK Birla Group is an Indian multinational conglomerate. With over 35,000 employees,
the group operates 52 manufacturing facilities across India and the world, with a presence in
diverse sectors including technology, automotive, home and building, and healthcare.
The CK Birla Group continuously adapts to stay ahead in a changing world. By harnessing
technology and investing in people and digital transformation, the Group consistently
remains agile and delivers profitable growth. Viewing value creation through a global lens,
our companies operate without borders.
What is the culture at GMMCO like?
Expected Answer: GMMCO’s culture is built on 3Es – Entrepreneurship, Empowerment and
Excellence. We consider you as a GEM, namely a high-potential leader with a GROW
Entrepreneurial Mindset. We expect you to be creative, innovative, self-reliant, flexible and
be comfortable with risk.
Leave policy
Applicable Group Leave Details
UG Sites – GDK11, Adriyata, Malanjkhand Schedule Leave – 56 days allowed in a year
All other employees CL – 10 days (Credited on pro-rata basis
during first year of service)
SL – 7 days (Non-ESI) (Credited on pro-rata
basis during first year of service)
PL – 25 days (Credited upon completion of
one year of service in Gmmco)
